text: In special relativity, the spacetime metric, also called the Minkowski metric', is the metric tensor that describes the line element in Minkowski spacetime. ==The metric== The metric can be described by the following line element: ds^2=c^2dt^2-(dx^1)^2-(dx^2)^2-(dx^3)^2 In units where the speed of light, c, is one, then the metric in matrix form is diag(1,-1,-1,-1) Category:Relativity
title: Spacetime metric
